inclusion.criterion: Ability of subjects to understand character and individual consequences of clinical trial
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to provide written informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe Coagulopathy (Prothrombin time < 50% of control, Partial thromboplastin time > 50 s)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy to fluorescein, acriflavin or cresyl violet
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and Clostridium difficile toxin positive stool samples.
